answer:
QUESTION

I have performed umrah a couple of months ago....and one mistake which i did in the state of ihraam was...i missed a farz namaaz while travelling towrds makkah....though i had time to offer namaaz after reaching makkah...i was unmindful of it and missed it....is tht a big mistake with respect to my completion of umrah...

is my umrah complete or i have to compansate for it.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

The umrah is valid. You should make Istighfaar for missing the fardh salah.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
